Description: Fragment of flattened handle at neck join, with gradual curve, of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine medium brown. Rectangular stamp with vase symbol.
Type series: KT442 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (286)
